arguments.text:
1. Reporting: Any employee who experiences or witnesses harassment must report it within 5 business days using the Harassment Reporting Form (HR portal).
2. Initial Review: HR will acknowledge receipt and conduct a preliminary review within 2 business days.
3. Investigation: A formal investigation will be launched within 5 business days of acknowledgment, involving interviews and evidence collection.
4. Decision: HR will issue a written decision within 10 business days after the investigation concludes.
5. Appeal: If the employee is unsatisfied, they may appeal the decision within 7 business days to the HR Director.
6. Confidentiality: All parties must maintain confidentiality; retaliation is prohibited and will be disciplined.

messages.content:
• Report the incident within 5 business days via the Harassment Reporting Form on the HR portal.
• HR acknowledges receipt and begins a preliminary review within 2 business days.
• A formal investigation starts within 5 business days of acknowledgment, including interviews and evidence gathering.
• HR provides a written decision within 10 business days after the investigation ends.
• If dissatisfied, appeal the decision to the HR Director within 7 business days.
• Maintain confidentiality; retaliation is prohibited and subject to discipline.

Here are the steps to file a workplace harassment complaint:

1. **Report** the incident within **5 business days** using the **Harassment Reporting Form** on the HR portal.
2. **HR acknowledges** receipt and conducts a preliminary review within **2 business days**.
3. A **formal investigation** begins within **5 business days** of acknowledgment, involving interviews and evidence collection.
4. **HR issues a written decision** within **10 business days** after the investigation concludes.
5. If you are **unsatisfied with the decision**, you may **appeal** to the **HR Director** within **7 business days**.
6. **Maintain confidentiality** throughout the process; retaliation is prohibited and will be disciplined.

You can view the full, up‑to‑date policy here: https://intranet.company.com/policies/harassment.pdf

If you need the Harassment Reporting Form or have any further questions, just let me know!
